lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Industry consultants said ATT will announce a faster addition to its 3B line of minicomputers, improved connectivity products, a new version of its Unix software operating system and assortered peripheral equipment, including a laser printer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: American Telephone and Telegraph Co is another illustration of a maxim already learned by several other huge corporations - that success in one segment of the electronics industry is very difficult to translate into success selling computers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: And, although the 43-year old Cassoni has considerable experience running Olivetti's successful computer operations, analysts expressed concern about his approach to ATT's business.
